titles.title: 836 Into My Heart (verse takes a little work)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come into my heart
O Lord Jesus
Come into my heart I pray
My soul is so troubled
And weary
Come into my heart today

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Into my heart
Into my heart
Come into my heart Lord Jesus
Come in today
Come in to stay
Come into my heart Lord Jesus

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come into my heart
O Lord Jesus
I need Thee through
Life's dreary way
The burden of sin is so heavy
Come into my heart to stay

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Come into my
O Lord Jesus
Now cleanse
And illumine my soul
Fill me
With Thy wonderful Spirit
Come in and take full control
